channel.title: Just Cause 2 successful multiplayer mod (Made by SA-MP developers)
channel.description:
[B]Just cause 2 is currently $8 on the summer steam sale, snatch it up for the next beta test![/B]
Last beta test was July 14-15 weekend, next expected test is July 27.
http://www.jc-mp.com/
This is truly amazing. JC2 Is one of my favorite games and I always wished it was multiplayer. But the mod team that made SA-MP have made it for JC2!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RtOwWoOiggc&feature=plcp
Theyre making the mp mod only available through a valid steam ID purchase, +1 for developers! But they're also letting pirates take part in the beta in hopes they will purchase the game.

item.title: Just Cause 2 successful multiplayer mod (Made by SA-MP developers)
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

yea, when you spawn you just have to grapple away as fast as you can lol

theres tons of /tp commands now

Read full topic

item.source: Just Cause 2 successful multiplayer mod (Made by SA-MP developers)

item.title: Just Cause 2 successful multiplayer mod (Made by SA-MP developers)
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Played it this Sunday just gone, didn’t really live up to my expectations If I was to sum it up in one word it would be irritating, the spawns were annoying, you died much too easily, then spent a good 10-15 minutes getting back to where you just were because the spawns are completely random.

But I accept it’s still in very early stages so I’ll be following the development

It did peak at 1700 players at one point though, which was pretty awesome.

Read full topic
item.source: Just Cause 2 successful multiplayer mod (Made by SA-MP developers)
